Title: Home of the Brave
Writer: Mark Friedman (screenplay), Mark Friedman (story), Irwin Winkler (story)
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Biel, Brian Presley, 50 Cent
Plot: Three soldiers struggle to readjust to life at home after returning home from a lengthy tour in Iraq.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 nominations.
Production: Freedom Films, Winkler Films, Millennium Films, Emmett/Furla Films
